text: Hodokoshi 〔sadaka〕 wa, hinja, konkyū-sha, kore (hodokoshi no jimu) o kanri suru mono, oyobi kokoro ga (shinri ni) katamuite kita mono no tame, mata minoshirokin ya fusai no kyūsai no tame, mata arrā no michi no tame (ni sossen shite doryoku suru mono), mata tabibito no tame no monodearu. Kore wa arrā no ketteidearu. Arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru
